name: Aim Llama: the Game
description:
Aim llama is all about precision. Ready your sniper and start testing your skills by successfully targeting various objects. Collect coins & use the right cards to complete challenging levels. Become the ultimate sniper and conquer the leaderboard!

Features:
- Challenging levels
- Beautiful effects and particles
- Come back every 3 hours to collect your reward
- Compete with other players in the Game Centre
- Haptic Feedback
- Optimised for any iOS device
- Play the right power-up card to save you from tricky levels
- Simple controls: Tap to aim!
- Free iMessage Sticker App included
